one of the largest and most diverse medical schools in the country, will graduate early."  192 UI COM students graduate early            Home aodunsi 2020-03-20T12:00:23-05:00   QUICK LINKS Admissions  Financial Aid  Programs  Campus Map  Make a Gift  College of Medicine Strategic Planning The University of Illinois College of Medicine is in the heart of a comprehensive strategic planning process that we hope will set the stage for continuous organizational and operational improvement. We are engaging a broad set of stakeholders across the entire college with the goal of strategically focusing our efforts toward a clearer and more transparent direction and improved results. Learn more.  INFORMATION FOR Prospective and Current Students Faculty & Staff  spacer  Alumni & Friends  spacer  Our Patients  spacer  NEWS 137th Commencement Ceremony   The 137th Commencement Ceremony of the University Of Illinois College Of Medicine was celebrated Friday, May 10, 2019, at Credit Union 1 Arena. The College of Medicine graduated, from all of its various degree programs, a total of 353 students. Of those 353, 306 have met all the requirements of the MD degree program, and constitute one of the largest graduating medical school classes in the United States. The Class of 2019 includes 183 who have completed the MD degree in Chicago; 49 in Peoria, 49 in Rockford, and 25 in Urbana-Champaign.
